specsKey: Nikon Coolpix L25 Point & Shoot Camera

Gr8 camera for its price.... good picture quality.... gr8 HD video recording... compared it to my canon...far better then it in all respects... better lens, better finish, sturdy build quality, good flash, good battery life... easy to use, gr8 modes... ideal for persons new in photography... all in all gr8 deal by nikon and flipkart!!!

For the price it is a very good camera. It supports 720p video recording which is a rarity in this price range. Compared to other cameras, this camera definitely has more features. The ease of use is what made me buy it. It is to be used by my younger sister who is still in College and thus, she wanted a sassy easy to use camera. This fits all the criteria (in red color too) and finally the price is very enticing.

A very good camera for regular use, official photography use and for new photographers. Clarity is excellent for 10.1 megapixel even in zooming to some extent. Options available to choose your pixel size thus adjusting memory consumption while saving. Video recording is average. However, clicks in poor light conditions is not very satisfactory. Another drawback is the use of AA Batteries for power. But the same has been compensated with free gift of two rechargeable batteries alongwith the charger.

An amazing beginner's snapping machine topped with the creamy service from Flipkart, really loved it!! You can expect to get value for each penny spent, be it the design, looks, user friendly buttons and menuâs and last but not the least the picture quality. If you are planning to give a kick start to your little hobby of freezing time through a lens, I bet, this is you tool. The built is a bit fragile and the display is a bit noisy, in spite, you wonât find a matching piece with such featured packed and looks at this price tag.

this camera is totally worth for money. before purchasing i have compared around 8 cameras but i found only this one the more efficient at my budget. this is good one for those who are fond of photography.

Gr8 camera for its price.... good picture quality.... gr8 HD video recording... compared it to my sony...far better then it in all respects... better lens, better finish, good flash, good battery life...easy to use gr8 deal by nikon and flipkart!!!

firstly..,kudos 2 d flipkart team for excellent delivery service... d camera was delivered within 24hrs of ordering...very impressed for somethin dat costs just 4.8k.,dis small cam blows ur mind away... image quality is very good,...although indoor images r grainy,..can still be fixed using flash mode(n other options) d various modes provided r easy 2 use n delivers good quality images image quality ISN'T affected much even upon zooming... overall a wonderful camera.... a must buy for starters who r taking baby steps into d world of photography..... delighted!!!!!

I purchase this camera,But picture quality is so poor,& also poor Zoom.Red eye is unavailable,that is used in night.I suggest you,Plz...Do not purchase this camera....My Best camera is 1)Nikon coolpix S3300 (RS.6600) & 2)Sony DSC-W690(RS.8200).

Its very nice camera i just buy it last sunday. Its picture quality is gr8. Its video Recording is also gr8. I like this Camera and avice people to buy this camera if they want to buy camera.It has lots of things like hd video recording,anti flicker,and many more things

Flipkart was good in delivering the product within 2 days but Iam Completly disappointed with Nikon...Worst product... ONLY CONS:_ Very poor lens very poor image quality Blur Images without flash Poor Zoom and worst Battery.... Please do'nt buy.... Did'snt expect a product like this from Flipkart and Nikon...

Warranty of the product is limited to only manufacturing defect on camera body.
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.
Customer needs to carry the product to the nearby Authorized Service Center to get the product repaired or inspected.

Nikon Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Defects or malfunctions caused by damage resulting from improper care, misuse or abuse of this product or operation of this product contrary to the instructions contained in the owner's manual. Nikon Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Defects or malfunctions caused by damage resulting from improper care, misuse or abuse of this product or operation of this product contrary to the instructions contained in the owner's manual. Damage or defect caused by accident, sand, water or battery leakage. Damage caused during transportation or mail. Damaged caused by any modifications or servicing performed by person(s) other than NIKON AUTHORISED SERVICE FACILITY. Accessories including batteries, charger, AC adaptor and other consumables. Any electronic data loss due to malfunctioning or repair of this product. Any consequential or incidental damages resulting from any breach of warranty, express or implied, applicable to this product. Nikon India New Extended Service Warranty (Local Warranty) does not apply to any of the followings:- Accessories like batteries, charger, USB cable, AV cable, Adapters, strap, etc. are not covered under warranty. Damage caused due to accident, sand, water, dust, fungus, battery leakage, etc are not covered under warranty. Warranty on free gifts is as per the terms of their respective manufactures, and this warranty does not extend to such gifts. Warranty does not cover the replacement of Product.
